constituent: stupid, sickness, hospital, know, dart, drop, heavens, mouth
koohiiStory1: Of course caveman is stupid. He doesn´t know anything. He´s a caveman!
koohiiStory2: This kanji shows stupidity as a "knowledge-sickness". Everybody can be stupid at times, and it usually happens because of a lack of experience. Hence the stupidity is a "knowledge sickness".
words: 愚痴(ぐち): idle complaint, grumble
